int CBasic::setMarginWidth ( int marginWidth )
 

int CBasic::getMarginWidth ( )
 

The amount of space between the widget's canvas and the widget's border. The canvas is the valid drawing area of the widget and is inside all borders and margins.

int CBasic::setBottomBorderColor ( PgColor_t bottomBorderColor )
 

Sets the color of the bottom and right sides of the border

int CBasic::setTopBorderColor ( PgColor_t topBorderColor )
 

Sets the color of the top and left sides of the border

int CBasic::highlight ( int borderWidth = 1,
PgColor_t bottomBorderColor = Pg_DGRAY,
PgColor_t topBorderColor = Pg_WHITE )
 

Highlights the widget with certain appearance parameteres

Reimplemented in CNumeric.

int CBasic::setBandwidthThreshold ( int bandwidthThreshold )
 

Defines the "graphics bandwidth" threshold that defines a slow connection. This resource is used by only a few widgets.

int CBasic::setFillPattern ( PgPattern_t fillPattern )
 

Sets the widget's background pattern.

int CBasic::setHighlightRoundness ( int highlightRoundness )
 

Sets the roundness of the widget's borders.

void CBasic::addActivateCallback ( PtCallbackF_t callbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

Adds a callback that the widget calls when it becomes activated. To activate a widget, the user releases the mouse button.

void CBasic::addArmCallback ( PtCallbackF_t callbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

Adds a callback that the widget calls when it becomes armed. To arm a widget, the user typically presses a mouse button while the screen pointer is on top of the widget.

void CBasic::addDisarmCallback ( PtCallbackF_t callbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

Adds a callback that the widget calls when it becomes disarmed. To disarm a widget, the user typically releases the mouse button used to arm the widget.

void CBasic::addGotFocusCallback ( PtCallbackF_t callbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

Adds a callback nvoked when a widget gets the focus or its focus status changes (e.g. a child widget gets focus from its parent or the focus switches from a child to its parent).

void CBasic::addLostFocusCallback ( PtCallbackF_t callbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

Adds a callback that the widget calls when it loses input focus.

void CBasic::addMenuCallback ( PtCallbackF_t callbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

Adds a callback that the widget calls when the user presses the right mouse button while the pointer is on top of the widget.

void CBasic::addRepeatCallback ( PtCallbackF_t callbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

Adds a callbacks that the widget calls when it receives button repeat events.
